overview:
James Wigger is a full time A-Level student and Web Developer, currently involved in Lovefre.sh Limited.

With an avid interest in the Web and the technologies that power it, as well as a constant desire to learn new skills, James has participated in a number of projects - primarily of a voluntary nature - to build up his skill set. These have ranged from simple web pages to maintaining heavily active forums. Recently picked up by good friend Mark Spofforth to develop the front-end interfaces of Lovefre.sh Limited.

Outside of Web Technologies, James enjoys studying History, Media and Computing in his home city of Norwich and is looking forward to going into further education once his A-Levels are complete.

James likes to relax with walks in the countryside, watching interesting films and reading.
